website_summaries.verdict: One of the most affordable convection microwaves available that still offers some convenient presets.
pros: Includes microwave, grill, and convection modes, as well as 5 auto-cook presets
You can use the different cooking modes alone or together, and the unit also includes an auto-cooling setting
cons: The temperature of the convection oven mode isn't always completely accurate

customer_reviews.title: Heating element went out in less than 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Bought one 3 years ago and it worked great for 3 years. Heating element went out. Bought another one because it was a great little oven. This one lasted less that 3 months.Now I have to figure out if there is any way to get a return or warranty.
customer_reviews.author: bfro

customer_reviews.title: Nice but id go for a more powerful unit next time
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient. Just be aware that when using the oven you have to add more time than in a full sized oven. Also, i found the microwave more matches a 700 or 800 watt. Almost had to double the cook time on popcorn from our old 1000w unit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice Everything it says it is.
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed. Have always looked at Daewoo as a bottom tier brand. I crossed my fingers and ordered because it had the features I wanted and it would fit where I wanted. I've had this for almost a year, and love it! It does EVERYTHING well!
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs Up!
customer_reviews.text: I waited a while to do this review to see how the product would work, and I have to say after 5 months that it's been a success thus far. Both the microwave and convection oven work well and clean up easily. It's an attractive appliance as well. Would definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't heat to set temp
customer_reviews.text: I am returning this because the convection setting does not work. I set it to 355F and heated to 155F, with an accurate temp probe. Shame. It had such potential.
customer_reviews.author: GrahamP

customer_reviews.title: Started out great
customer_reviews.text: I received this convection microwave on November 1, 2019. I absolutely loved it. It was easy to use, it worked as advertised. On December 27, 2019, the oven portion of the unit decided that it didn't want to work anymore (heating element doesn't appear to be working). At this point, an Easy Bake Oven would be more effective. It's a shame, because it's an attractive oven, and it HAD been working beautifully. Unfortunately, my window to return the product closed on December 4th, so I'm stuck with a fairly pricey microwave. I regret ignoring other people's reviews that had mentioned the heating element going out -- could have saved me some disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Used barely two months and already defective!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd oven we received. The first one was damaged upon delivery. Now the second one has gone weird. We used the grill and oven options equally as much as the microwave. Two days ago, the oven started to trip the breaker. Now only the microwave option is useable without tripping the power. We had the outlets checked and they are fine. Suddenly the dial button has become creaky. Instead of being a smooth dial, it feels like it's grinding. This happened all of a sudden. I am very disappointed and I don't know, if I can receive a replacement or my money back. I wouldn't by from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Archeryprowizard

customer_reviews.title: Nice Micro convection oven
customer_reviews.text: Works well. I miss not having the one touch keys from previous oven but other than that it works great on both Microwave mode and convection mode.
customer_reviews.author: BigH501

customer_reviews.title: Microwave defective and I really wanted to love it --very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: It's defective as the right side of it separated from the appliance. After using a few times it just shut down suddenly. The cooling feature which attracted me turns on automatically--And get this: you can't shut it off you have to wait unti it does on it's own. Their are very few features unlike many microwaves. I called cust service no replacements. Big disappointment when you consider the price.
customer_reviews.author: a.buyer

customer_reviews.title: Works good as microwave for small space
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with convection oven feature. We were hoping to replace our toaster oven but for the most part, we aren't getting ok results. Will either get toaster oven back out or use oven. And we'll keep experimenting with convection to see what we can use it for. We like the small size. The microwave works well but isn't powerful since it's small so takes extra time. After using for awhile... we noticed it gets quite wet inside after using it, more than other micros. We leave the door open to dry out. And we have to add to cooking time due to low power.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Nice design and multi-function but died.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in January to replace my old broken microwave, with the intention of consolidating my broken microwave and countertop toaster into 1 appliance. The unit looks great outside and in but the menu options can be a little complicated. The microwave function works well and no better or worse than my old microwave. The convection/grill option is nice but not as good as a dedicated countertop oven. For example, frozen waffles may take 5-7 minutes in a countertop oven but in this unit will take twice as long, or more. Unfortunately, my convection/grill function stopped working after only 2 months and I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: pekohl

customer_reviews.title: Update:  customer Daewoo service promptly and courteously arranged for refund process.
customer_reviews.text: Worked well 2 months then stopped reaching higher temperatures in convection mode and failed in grill mode.
customer_reviews.author: ebs

customer_reviews.title: Duo functions sound good, but only one of the two worked as it should.
customer_reviews.text: The convection oven, based on my two attempts to bake/cook, only cooked well on the top half of my dinner rolls; the bottom half appeared doughy & uncooked. The microwave function did well, though lacking in power.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Keep Looking
customer_reviews.text: I would give this zero stars across the board if I could. I bought this microwave/convection oven in September of 2019. It lasted one month before it completely died. I contacted Daewoo about a refund, since I had the unit for such a short time. Well, it's now May of 2020 and I am still waiting for my refund. I submitted everything asked of me and all I get is a runaround and dates that a refund is promised and the dates come and go and I'm still waiting, despite contacting them almost daily. Bad all around experience with the product and the company.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Dali

customer_reviews.title: Super purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I love this convection microwave. We have a larger one in our RV. This one fits easily on our counter. Made alot of meals in it already. Pumpkin pie , mmmm mmm.
customer_reviews.author: Marv Erstad

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It does what it is supposed to do. It's easy to use. It works well on all settings. My only complaint is the beeping is a little loud. It would be nice if you could turn 'beep on button press' off.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Appreciate both microwave and convection ability
customer_reviews.text: My sons new house didn’t come with an oven, he said it’s great
customer_reviews.author: jan

customer_reviews.title: Working well
customer_reviews.text: They had great customer service and the product works vey efficiently without too much heat put out.
customer_reviews.author: Milteix

customer_reviews.title: Great product to buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my camper very easy to operate. The temperature degree on a recipe may say 350 but I have to bump up the temperature to get food done on the oven. Easy to operate and clean.
customer_reviews.author: deedra

customer_reviews.title: It was nice for about a week.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this microwave in April. The microwave function stop working after about a week. I contacted the company. They said they would send me a refund and I'm still waiting for it after 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Potentially dangerous because this microwave continued working when I opened the door.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this microwave late Spring of 2019 and it stopped working in February 2020. I am lucky I wasn't hurt because I opened the door of the unit and it stayed on! I'm past any return window because I have had this product for 6 months now.
customer_reviews.author: Suzie Q

customer_reviews.title: Versatility and compact size.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a smaller microwave/convection oven to fit in a small space. This is the only oven small enough to fit. It works well. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: John Walker

customer_reviews.title: Price/function good longevity poor
customer_reviews.text: Was a nice little combi. Microwave function failed in 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Deock

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend anyone to buy
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend anyone to buy. The glass plate came with a crack. Also it has cardboard inside the microwave on one side, with screws on it. Smoke is coming out heavily then any usual microwave. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Convection oven
customer_reviews.text: This oven works perfectly for the need we have. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Becky C.

customer_reviews.title: Convection and microwave functions
customer_reviews.text: Is what I needed and it works fine for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael R. Saldana

customer_reviews.title: More than I thought I would get for the money
customer_reviews.text: More than I thought I would get for the money
customer_reviews.author: Ben F. Willems

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: It takes a while to get familiar with everything on it. We are still learning how to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: For the price this oven is the best value. The steam cleaning feature makes it so easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Cooks everything
customer_reviews.text: Fit PERFECT in my space above the stove in my camper
customer_reviews.author: Brandon M.

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 2 1/2 months!
customer_reviews.text: Seemed fine in the beginning, then oven stopped getting hot, then microwave started making strange sound. Waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Lisa D'Olimpio

customer_reviews.title: Awesome item!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this item. Bought for our boat & we use it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: K Crew

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Combination Microwave
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value for a combination convection/grilling microwave oven. Easy to use and cooks fast for only 900 watts.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn T Meeks

product_meta.title: Daewoo KOC-9HAFDB Convection Air Fryer Microwave Oven 0.9 Cu. Ft., 900W | Black
product_meta.description: Style:Convection/Air FryerThe Daewoo KOC-9HAFDB Convection microwave and air fryer in Black is full of features and is capable of taking care of all your cooking needs in one attractive unit. It features a 1, 850W convection/combination oven, a 2300W grill, 900W microwave output. The convection ovens combination of high performing heater and rapid air circulation are to produce great cooking results. The home fryer bowl, included with the unit, can produce healthy low fat crisp food for up to three portions at a time, so there are many cooking options With this feature. The auto cook programs take the guesswork out of cooking and you can just press the auto-cook button to make oil free food in minutes. This model also has 10 variable power levels, two-way defrost function by time and weight, a durable easy clean cavity with steam clean feature, LED lighting display with dial knob lighting.
